scripts.install:all: npm run install:telegram && npm run install:main && npm run install:extension && npm run install:db
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:telegram" "npm run start:main" "npm run start:extension" "npm run start:db"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run start:telegram:dev" "npm run start:main:dev" "npm run start:extension" "npm run start:db"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "npm run start:telegram:prod" "npm run start:main:prod" "npm run start:extension" "npm run start:db"
